title: BEAUTY VAULT Infinite Radiance Serum 20ml
features: The only serum in the market that's fully loaded with the 7 potent ingredients that truly beautifies your skin.
Vitamin C, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid , UVA-Ursi -Bearberry , Beta Glucans, Seaweed and Vitamin E
description: The only serum in the market that's fully loaded with the 7 potent ingredients that truly beautifies your skin. 1. Vitamin C - As far as your skin is concerned, vitamin C is "a potent antioxidant.Because of its antioxidant properties, vitamin C aids in your skin's natural regeneration process, which helps your body repair damaged skin cells." 2. Collagen - Collagen has many important functions, including providing your skin with structure,a great anti-aging ingredient - it winds back our skin clock! 3. Hyaluronic Acid - Hyaluronic acid is well known for its skin benefits, especially alleviating dry skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and speeding up wound healing so its best for people with Acne breakouts. 4. Uva-Ursi - Bearberry - Arctostaphylos Uva-ursi History. Bearberry extract has a well documented ability to BRIGHTEN skin, heal UV damage, and banish sunspots and melanomas. 5. Seaweed - Seaweed help your skin to plump up, smoothing out fine lines with its anti-aging properties. 6.Beta Glucans - work twofold to soothe and calm irritated skin and as an effective anti-ager to firm and plump fine lines and wrinkles. 7. Vitamin E - IT HELPS PREVENT SIGNS OF AGING. It COMPLEMENTS YOUR SPF Aside from scavenging free radicals, vitamin E also absorbs UVB light. It KEEPS SKIN HYDRATED AND CALM. Because vitamin E lives in and protects cell membranes, which form a barrier around cells to keep them healthy and hydrated, it indirectly helps skin stay moisturized and supple. Plus, along with being an effective antioxidant, vitamin E also fights inflammation.
